cms:textAsset.cms:content:
Education

email address herephone number heresms phone number herefax number hereminicom number here

Students are encouraged to take part in the extensive range of clubs and societies that schools have to offer, which take place within the lunch hour and after school.

These can include Art Clubs, Debating Societies, the Duke of Edinburgh Award scheme, Drama, Chess, Computer, Maths, Football, Netball, etc. These activities are in addition to a wide range of musical, dramatic and sporting activities, which are already included in the Curriculum.

To see what clubs each school has to offer, link to their websites via our School Contact List link to pid 17
